jade.mtp.http2
Class HTTPSocketFactory

java.lang.Object
  jade.mtp.http2.HTTPSocketFactory

public class HTTPSocketFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class for obtaining sockets. HTTP MTP calls methods use this class every time that a socket is needed. This version uses cascom.net.Socket instead of java.net.Socket in order to be compatible also with J2ME

Author:
Joan Ametller Esquerra, Ahti Syreeni - TeliaSonera
